name: Sinner's Basement [DEMO]
description:
Sinner's Basement

Is about a family man who lost his wife and daughter in a terrible massacre in his neighborhood 4 years ago. The killer is still at large and you still have nightmares trying to get your wife and daughter back. But this time it goes further, you find yourself in a basement which is a kind of purgatory. You have to escape from it and find out why you are trapped there.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Mouse Left Click - Interaction
F - Toggle flashlight on / off

Note:

The demonstration of this project was completed in one week and the finished game is scheduled for late 2022 or early 2023 if there is sufficient support. The length of the demo is about 6 - 7 minutes, everything seen in this demo will change in the final version of the game.
